notes.note: A new  Firefox Search widget can be added  to the home screen from the Android Widget Menu.
Firefox for Android Beta is now available for ARM64
Included Twemoji Mozilla font updated to support Emoji 11.0 🥳

The [Guest Session][1] feature has been removed to streamline user experience. Please use Private Browsing on Firefox for Android to keep your sessions separate or your device's guest mode feature.


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/share-your-android-device-firefox-guest-session

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 67.0beta Beta
